trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

trait.name: Earth Glide
trait.text: You have a burrowing speed of 20 feet.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
trait.text: You have advantage in Dexterity (Stealth) checks to hide while in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Mineral Diet
trait.text: Instead of food and water, you must consume 5 gp worth of gems or precious metal per day or suffer a level of exhaustion. You can consome coins to satisfy this requirement.

trait.name: Rock Hard Jaw
trait.text: You have tough teeth. You can make an unarmed melee weapon attack using them. This deals 1d4 piercing damage, and increases by 1d4 at 5th level, 11th level, and 17th level.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Terran.
